title: Glacier National Park: Glacier Instameets
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Ranger-led Activities     Glacier Instameets                Glacier InstaMeets         Lake McDonald InstaMeet April 23, 2016   Come together to connect, explore, and celebrate your creativity with your camera. Join us for one (or all) of our InstaMeets throughout the year as we gather to make friends, take photos, and exchange ideas. All ages, levels of experience, and types of cameras are welcome! Share your photos using #GlacierNPS.  Additional dates and times will be added as they become available. Be sure to check back throughout the year! We look forward to meeting you!  Â    April Sunset at Lake McDonald Saturday April 23, 2016 at 7 pm Meet at the Apgar Village public boat launch and dock.  May  Sunset at Lake McDonald Saturday May 28, 2016 at 8 pm Meet at the Apgar Village public boat launch and dock.   June   Sunset in Two Medicine Saturday June 11, 2016 at 8 pm Meet at the Two Medicine Lake boat launch and dock.      Sunset at Logan Pass Saturday June 25, 2016 at 8 pm Meet at the Logan Pass parking lot.   July   Sunset at Lake McDonald Saturday July 9, 2016 at 8 pm Meet at the Apgar Village public boat launch and dock.      Sunset at Many Glacier Saturday July 23, 2016 at 8 pm Meet at the Swiftcurrent Lake boat dock.   August  Sunset at Saint Mary Lake Saturday August 13, 2016 at 7 pm Meet at the 1913 Ranger Station parking lot. We will take a short .25 mile hike out to the lake shore from the parking lot.     Centennial InstaMeet at Lake McDonald Thursday August 25, 2016 at 6 pm Meet at the Apgar Village parking area.    September TBD
